fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a player each night and attempt to guess their birthday. If youâ€™re successful, give them a birthday gift of their choice. The gift can be either a one-time night-use role investigation on a target of their choice (Results are randomized howerver), an automatic None shield (It appears as Powerful) for the next time they're attacked, or a one use Powerful attack night ability (Also gives their target Powerful defense). fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may not target yourself, and you may not target the same person more than once.
- You have a one-time Basic scumshield.
- You should probably just ask people for their birthday instead of actually guessing lol
- Once you reach your goal everyone you gifted will be dealt an Overkill attack.
- You will appear as Happy Birthday! (2126) to investigations and when using abilites.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Give three people questionable birthday gifts.
